text: The Talker is a 1925 American silent drama film directed by Alfred E. Green and starring Anna Q. Nilsson, Lewis Stone and Shirley Mason.Monaco p.175 ==Cast== * Anna Q. Nilsson as Kate Lennox * Lewis Stone as Harry Lennox * Shirley Mason as Ruth Lennox * Ian Keith as Ned Hollister * Tully Marshall as Henry Fells * Barbara Bedford as Barbara Farley * Harold Goodwin as Lonnie Whinston * Gertrude Short as Maud Fells * Lydia Yeamans Titus as Mrs. Fells * Cecille Evans as Stenographer * Charles West as Detective ==References== ==Bibliography== * Monaco, James. The Encyclopedia of Film. Perigee Books, 1991. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:1925 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Alfred E. Green Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:First National Pictures films Category:American black- and-white films
title: The Talker
